code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{getClients,deleteClient}from'../../store/slices/clientSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ClientsList=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{clients,isLoading}=useSelector(state=>state.clients);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getClients());},[dispatch]);const handleDelete=id=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this client?')){dispatch(deleteClient(id));}};const handleUpdate=id=>{navigate(`/admin/clients/${id}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-800",children:"Clients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin/clients/new",className:"bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-md hover:bg-indigo-700",children:"Add New Client"})]}),isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center py-4",children:"Loading clients..."}):clients.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center py-4",children:"No clients found. Add your first client!"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-x-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 uppercase text-sm leading-normal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-left",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-left",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-left",children:"Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-center",children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{className:"text-gray-600 text-sm",children:clients.map(client=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-b border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-left",children:client.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-left",children:client.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-left",children:client.phone}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex item-center justify-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleUpdate(client._id),className:"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-900 mx-2",children:"Update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(client._id),className:"text-red-600 hover:text-red-900 mx-2",children:"Delete"})]})})]},client._id))})]})})]});};export default ClientsList;
